basics.name: Yogi Erka Julyansa Putra
basics.label: Senior Backend Developer
basics.summary:
Hello! I am an experienced Candidate with 6 years of experience, holding a degree in Informatic Engineering from the State Islamic University of Sultan Syarif Kasim Riau. I have mastered several programming languages such as:
  • Java
  • Ruby
  • Golang
  • Node.js

Additionally, I am proficient in:
  • systems design
  • full software development cycle
  • load testing
  • mentoring
  • problem-solving
  • analytical skills
  • leadership

        • Throughout my career, I have demonstrated a proven track record working in various roles across the product life cycle, including:
        • Chief Technology Officer
        • Backend Developer
        • Frontend Developer
        • System Analyst
        • Product Manager
        • Mobile Teams
        With a diverse skill set and extensive experience, I am a valuable asset to any team or project.
        Passionate about technology and dedicated to delivering excellence, I am ready to contribute my utmost to drive success in any endeavor. Thank you!

work.summary: Joined the Athena project, a Bosch & Daimler effort to bring a level 4 autonomous car to the streets.
Machine learning services, Education Services, Goverment Services
